value.name: UK politics – live: Boris claims Sunak ‘refused to engage’ post-Covid because he wanted to be PM
value.description: Boris Johnson said Rishi Sunak “refused to engage” with him on kick-starting the UK economy after lockdown because the chancellor wanted to be PM, according to an extract from Nadine Dorries’ book.

value.name: Rishi Sunak warns of Keir Starmer plot to lock UK into EU deal in major Brexit betrayal
value.description: He said Keir Starmer would reverse progress made and, laying the groundwork for an general election, the Prime Minister put law and order at the heart of the King’s Speech. value.name: Conservatives losing more 2019 voters to Reform UK than Labour, poll suggests

value.name: My daily fight for medical cannabis is agonising – UK drug laws have failed
value.description: I’m now 43 and a “legal” cannabis consumer. Like thousands of others, I took the reticent step of collecting my medical records, seeking a private prescription from one of the many cannabis clinics that now exist in the UK.

value.name: Public urged to ‘stay alert’ as UK terror reports double after Hamas attack on Israel
value.description: Police received 1,350 reports to a counter terror hotline between 7 and 25 October amid fears overseas events could inspire a Christmas attack

value.name: Why UK Is Probing Covid Response and What It Will Achieve
value.description: The UK’s official Covid-19 inquiry, one of the biggest and likely most expensive investigations in British history, has heard how former Prime Minister Boris Johnson was ill-suited to the crisis and oversaw a damaging culture that involved drinks parties in his offices while the public were told to stay at home.

value.name: Northern Ireland politics: What's important for young republicans?
value.description: Young republicans still wave and wear the colours of the Irish tricolour, a practice evident at a recent appearance by the Irish language hip-hop group Kneecap in Belfast. The band has embraced controversy and attracted a lot of attention with its use of images associated with the Troubles.

value.name: Suggestion of political motivation in Shared Island funding rejected
